name: Playground (Squasheux)
description:
This is Playground a Islanders fan game made in a 48h GameJam at Paris Ynov Campus. The group was made of 7 students. The Base Mechanics were delivered in the project given at the start of the GameJam. 

Experience the joy of growing up and see your toys evolve with you in this little puzzle game ! 

You will experience 3 different stages of toys: the bathtub toys, the wooden toys and the video games. Each level will have their own identity and buildings to manage. Try to manage your space as efficiently as possible because certain buildings don't get along together. 

We hope you will enjoy this game as much as us making it !
